name: The Fall (itch) (43ther, Fatal-Exit)
description:
Figure out how to reach your target destination without being able to jump and avoid getting stuck in points of no return. Will you overcome the obstacles that came with the change that impacted your life?

Team Members

43ther - Game Designer & Programmer

Fatal-Exit - Audio Designer & Artist

Galo - Artist
